Wire-to-Board Assembly

Wire to Board Cable Assembly

Custom wire-to-board cable assemblies manufactured to your specifications. PCB connectors with pre-crimped wires for board mounting applications. Support for JST, Molex, DuPont compatible series and custom headers. UL-certified wire, 100% electrical testing.

Upload Drawing for Quote OEM Services

Connector Series

JST Compatible
PH, XH, VH, EH
2.0-3.96mm | 2-7A
Molex Compatible
KK 254, Micro-Fit 3.0, Mini-Fit
2.54-4.2mm | 3-9A
DuPont Compatible
2.54mm standard
2.54mm | 3A
Custom Headers
Pin headers, Box headers
Custom | Spec

Applications

Typical Use Cases

▸ PCB power supply connections
▸ LED driver to LED strip wiring
▸ Battery to board interconnects
▸ Industrial control panel wiring
▸ Sensor to controller connections
▸ Power distribution units

Wire Specifications

Wire Type AWG Range Temp Rating Voltage
UL1007 AWG 28-20 80°C 300V
UL1015 AWG 26-16 105°C 600V
Silicone AWG 26-14 150°C 600V
XLPE AWG 22-14 105°C 600V
